name: Lugg
headline: Move anything, anytime, anywhere
description:
Lugg is building the best way for you to get anything moved. With the push of a button, you are connected to movers and a truck. They make it dead simple to get your new furniture home, your craigslist purchases delivered to you, and moving all of your stuff into your new apartment.

They are located in San Francisco and well-funded by some of the greatest investors in the world, like A-Capital, Sequoia Capital, SV Angel, and Y Combinator.

They are a small team with incredibly hard problems to solve. They are hiring and would love to hear from you! hello@Lugg.com

Download Lugg and let them be your friend with a truck! http://lugg.com
generated_description:
**Company Overview: Lugg**

**Mission:**
Lugg's mission is succinct and powerful: "Move anything, anytime, anywhere." They strive to be the simplest solution to moving needs, connecting users to trucks and drivers with just the push of a button.

**Founding & Background:**
Founded in 2014 and initially part of the Y Combinator Batch S15, Lugg started in San Francisco. Over the years, it has attracted significant investment from top-tier backers such as A-Capital, Sequoia Capital, SV Angel, and Y Combinator itself.

**Services Offered:**
Lugg's platform provides on-demand moving services and furniture delivery. Users can schedule movers to transport furniture, large purchases from Craigslist or Facebook Marketplace, office items, and even handle junk removal. The system operates on your timetable, with real-time tracking and a range of vehicle sizes to fit different moving scenarios.

- **Key Services Include:**
  - Home and apartment moving
  - College and office moves
  - Furniture and appliance delivery
  - Junk removal and donation pickups
  
**User Experience:**
Customers rave about Lugg's efficiency, professionalism, and care taken with their belongings. The 5-star rated service ensures vetted movers with ratings based on real customer feedback. It's akin to “Uber for moving,” where reliability meets convenience.

**Team & Hiring:**
Lugg operates with a compact team of around 50 employees, tackling the demanding challenges of logistics head-on. They're constantly looking to expand and welcome talent interested in solving meaningful problems. If you’re interested in joining, your chance to jump on board is here—reach out at hello@Lugg.com.

**Location:**
Based in the bustling tech scene of San Francisco, Lugg is perfectly situated to cater to a rapidly growing market for quick and reliable moving solutions.

**Conclusion:**
If you’re looking for a hassle-free way to move items across town or need help transporting your latest online purchase, Lugg is worth your consideration. Download the app and experience the ease of moving anything, anytime, anywhere.

For more information, check their website: [Lugg.com](http://lugg.com).
